title: Food Book Cover font
content:
Hi guys,  
do you know which is the font of this book cover? there is a nice clean Futura kind of look:

[http://www.pixentral.com/show.php?picture=1QRuwN0kiNYp8SxApM27GlXwgloDF1](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824112610/http:/www.pixentral.com/show.php?picture=1QRuwN0kiNYp8SxApM27GlXwgloDF1 "http://www.pixentral.com/show.php?picture=1QRuwN0kiNYp8SxApM27GlXwgloDF1")

and also Script font but it is very small in the picture i don't know if anyone can see it well.

Best,
author: uzapucax

comments.content: thanks for the good info Ryuk ;)

The "Foreword by" script is **[ITC Kulukundis](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824112610/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Kulukundis%20ITC%20-%20Regular&fid=ad6d10ce57a90fc37b24eabfeab839e5&fsize=60&text=Foreword%20by&fit=1)** by Daniel Pelavin [ITC, 1997]
